title: Kevin Bacon on his #IStayHomeFor social distancing campaign
description: Award-winning actor Kevin Bacon created the social media campaign "I Stay Home For" to encourage social distancing as the country works to slow the spread of the coronavirus. Celebrities like Ellen Degeneres, Demi Lovato and Elton John have all joined the eff…
